subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=[[건]], [[간]]|rv=geon, gan|mr=kŏn, kan}}

# ([[하늘]] 건, ''haneul-''): [[sky]]
# ([[건괘]] 건, ''geon-gwae-''): {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☷}} or the 1st of the Eight Trigrams ({{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☰☱☲☳☴☵☶☷}} or [[w:Ba gua (concept)|八卦]] ([[팔괘]], ''palgwae''))
# ([[임금]] 건, ''im-geum-''): [[king]]
# ([[마르다|마를]] 건, ''mareul-''): to be [[dry]]

subSections.title: See also
subSections.text:
[[w:Ba gua (concept)|八卦]] ([[팔괘]], ''palgwae'')
    {| class=wikitable |- | 7+0=111+000 (U+2630)* | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☰}} | [[乾]] | [[天]] | [[sky]] |- | 6+1=110+001 (U+2631) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☱}} | [[兌]] | [[澤]] | [[marsh]] |- | 5+2=101+010 (U+2632) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☲}} | [[離]] | [[火]] | [[fire]] |- | 4+3=100+011 (U+2633) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☳}} | [[震]] | [[雷]] | [[thunder]] |- | 3+4=011+100 (U+2634) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☴}} | [[巽]] | [[風]] | [[wind]] |- | 2+5=010+101 (U+2635) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☵}} | [[坎]] | [[水]] | [[water]] |- | 1+6=001+110 (U+2636) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☶}} | [[艮]] | [[山]] | [[mountain]] |- | 0+7=000+111 (U+2637) | {{lang|und|sc=Latinx|☷}} | [[坤]] | [[地]] | [[earth]] |} [*] Decimal pair=Binary pair (Codepoint). (The solid bar "—" of the Trigrams may be assigned to the binary number "1", while the split bar "--" to "0".)
[[Category:Hanja readings|건]]
